channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rep. Jasmine Crockett suggests fellow Democrats to reconsider if Chuck Schumer can lead party
item.description: Rep. Jasmine Crockett on Sunday suggested that fellow Democrats seek someone other than Senate Minority Leader Charles E. Schumer to lead the party.
